sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
China Affairs Council Act.

sections.heading: Every official or employee of an office of the Coordination
sections.text:
Council for North American Affairs located in Illinois shall have the same
rights, privileges and immunities enjoyed by officials and employees of
any office of the Republic of China on Taiwan located in Illinois prior to
January 1, 1979, including applying for and displaying special Illinois
registration plates, registration stickers and cards as provided in Section
3-615 of the Illinois Vehicle Code.
